name: Pip Factory
description:
Build a factory made of dice! Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Controls:

  • Left Click: Roll dice/purchase
  • Right Click: Move objects
  • Middle Click: Pan camera
  • Mouse wheel: Zoom
  • F11: Fullscreen toggle

Sound credits:

  • Dice roll: https://freesound.org/people/joanneneedsthesound/sounds/177208/
  • Dice impact: https://freesound.org/people/andresix/sounds/347807/
  • Place: https://freesound.org/people/Snapper4298/sounds/177494/
  • Win: https://freesound.org/people/plasterbrain/sounds/397355/
  • Dice cup: https://freesound.org/people/2BACH/sounds/185985/
  • Card: https://freesound.org/people/f4ngy/sounds/240776/

Font credits:

  • Open Sans: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Open+Sans
  • Roboto: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto
  • Bebas Neue: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bebas+Neue
